text: Yvonne Strahovski Net Worth and salary : Yvonne Strahovski is an Australian actress who has a net worth of $ 12 million. Yvonne Strahovski earned her net worth entertaining audiences with her acting performances on the screen and made for TV movies. She was born Yvonne Jaqueline Strzechowski on July 30, 1982, in Campbelltown, a suburb of Sydney. She first became famous for her role as Agent Sarah Walker on the NBC comedy series Chuck ( 2007 â€“ 2012 ). Even though she had already been popular in her native Australia, the action - packed series unveiled Strahovski's natural talents and appeal in front of American audience. As talented as beautiful, Strzechowski mesmerized both men and women viewers, the first being mainly drawn by her sleek and sexy physique
